**Renata Oliveira**

I'm an associate Professor at the Federal Center for Technological Education of Minas Gerais. Lecturer at the Federal University of Minas Gerais. I'm also a researcher at the PLACES - PLanning for ACcESs research group with a focus on accessibility oriented planning, Urban Freight Transportation and applied spatial analysis. I'm a member of the Network on Intelligent Urban Mobility and Accessibility Research (NIUMAR) and of the Network for Organizational Studies, Society and Subjectivity (NOSS).
